app.name: Korbo's Wii Donut Mod
app.short_description: Korbo's spinning donut for your Wii (and GBA)!
app.long_description:
Wii Donut, a spinning donut for your Wii! All the hard work was done by Andy Sloane (donut generation code) and Jogeir Liljedahl (the sweet music), I just threw it on a Wii. HEAVILY modified by Korbo.
GBA Donut requires a GBA link cable plugged in the 2nd controller port.
Music can be changed by adding a "music.(mod/it/s3m/xm/etc.)" file in the app directory. This program supports *most* tracker music formats.
e-mail: Korbo: korbin.m.marshall@gmail.com emilydaemon: emilydaemon@donut.eu.org Andy Sloane: andy@a1k0n.net
The background song is "Addiction" by Jogeir Liljedahl.
